subject: Question
description_text:
Hello, I am a novice simracer. I often sit and choose the best components
for my future setup. And recently I found your peripherals such as pedals,
gearbox, steering wheel, handbrakes. It's incredible, the gearbox looks
very cool, the pedals don't look cool, but also the best thing I basically
wanted. The steering wheel also left positive emotions. And I noticed that
almost everything I want to collect for my setup. It consists of your
peripherals, and I wondered if you had a steering base. In one of the
videos, I saw a steering base setup in a proprietary application from
simsonn, and I started looking. I found your official website and saw the
steering base section. It said that it was still undergoing testing and the
development phase. And I was wondering how long I should wait. I thought it
would be nice to make a complete setup from your company. Can you at least
tell me approximately when your steering base could be expected to go on
sale? Thank you in advance for your reply, and good luck in creating a
steering base.

conversations.body_text: Hi Артур Сокол,  Our wheelbase still needs a bit more time for final preparation, but it will be available very soon.
